game.name: The Story Page
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An independently developed indie game in the genre of online RPG with an open world created by a single person. Create your own character using the editor. Engage in various activities ranging from fishing and farming to managing taverns, castles, and even entire cities.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An independently developed indie game in the genre of online RPG with an open world created by a single person. Create your own character using the editor. Engage in various activities ranging from fishing and farming to managing taverns, castles, and even entire cities.
